channel.title: Object Request - PWM Osc with Sync
channel.description:
I guess the title says it all - I'm afraid coding objects is beyond my ability, but I'd love an oscillator with PWM *and* sync. Failing that, a comparator object to convert the output of the Saw/Sync oscillator to provide the same result.
Any geniuses out there?

item.title: Object Request - PWM Osc with Sync
item.dc:creator: @Broadwave
item.description:
@Broadwave wrote:

Thanks for that - Although I haven't got a clue what I'm really doing, I've just opened your pwm_sync.axo, along with the original PWM Osc and Square Sync Osc in a text editor, and by comparing the code, I think I may have found what's wrong (a few references missing from the Square Sync Osc, that need to be carried over to the PWM Osc) - I'm hoping it's a simple matter of cut and paste.

I think the uuid needs to be changed too.

I'll take a closer look after I've had a cup of tea

Read full topic
item.source: Object Request - PWM Osc with Sync

item.title: Object Request - PWM Osc with Sync
item.dc:creator: @workerparasite303
item.description:
@workerparasite303 wrote:

hmm, i just spent a few minutes trying to edit a backup of the PWM osc to fit your request and was not successful. here's the object in case you're curious, or perhaps someone with more knowledge can fix this

.pwm_sync.axo (2.9 KB)

Read full topic
